column4: "We have just secured a big arms deal
column5: we will be selling some of our weapons and vehicles for export
column6: for exchange of money and other things
column7: this should boost our economy and improve our relations with the country with whom we negotiate!"

column4: " our state has a problem of deflation
column5: which has a negative effect on GDP. Our state needs a greater supply of money to increase investment and stabilize the economy."

column4: " our state has a high inflation rate
column5: because of the high amount of our money supply and low wages. This has a negative effect on purchasing power and GDP. Our monetary strength is low and people fall into poverty. Many people do not invest in consumer goods."

column4: " Sweden has a big gang problem
column5: we need to fund our police to fight it!"
